segments.text: I can’t believe how careless the woman is being right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is literally flooding the kitchen, and she’s just drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the water, and she doesn’t even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are taking advantage of her distraction, and it’s infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall off that stool, and she’s completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, like this is a normal day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout at her to turn around and see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a mess, and it’s all because she’s not paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she realizes what’s going on before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just irresponsible parenting at its finest.
segments.speaker: PAR
